src:
Sjokktap for Barcelona: ‚Äì Alt falt fra hverandre
Barcelona raknet og slapp inn tre m√•l p√• syv minutter.
02 Nov 2019, 22:42 by NTB-AFP

LEVANTE - BARCELONA 3‚Äì1

Lionel Messi ga serieleder Barcelona ledelsen, men jubelen stilnet fort da hjemmelaget Levante scoret tre ganger p√• syv minutter p√• vei mot 3-1-seier.
Eneste tr√∏st var at verken Real Madrid, Atl√©tico Madrid eller Sevilla greide √• utnytte Barcelonas feilskj√¶r og skyve laget ned fra tabelltoppen.
Det ble bare ett poeng p√• hver av dem.

‚Äì Alt falt fra hverandre, sa Barcelona-trener Erneste Valverde om de tunge minuttene fra det 61. til det 68. minutt i Valencia.

‚Äì Vi startet ikke den andre omgangen bra. Vi skapte ikke sjanser. Det gjorde ikke Levante heller, men s√• scoret de plutselig to ganger p√• et par minutter. Det tredje ble t√∏ft for oss.

Messi scoret sitt sjette m√•l p√• fem kamper da han satte inn et straffespark som ga Barcelona ledelsen til pause. Det var hans 500. m√•l scoret med venstrebeinet, og det satte laget p√• kurs mot en ny seier, f√∏r alt vendte i 2. omgang.

Jos√© Campa√±a og Borja Mayoral scoret i det 61. og 63. minutt, og dermed ledet hjemmelaget. Nemanja Radojas 3-1-m√•l ble kampens siste.

SISTE: √òdegaard ute p√• ubestemt tid

‚Äì V√•re motstandere spiller alltid som om det er √•rets viktigste kamp. Da m√• man kunne svare, sa Valverde.
Dagen ble ikke bedre av at Luis Su√°rez m√•tte ut med en skade i leggen like f√∏r pause. Han er tvilsom til tirsdagens mesterligakamp mot Slavia Praha.


Luis Su√°rez m√•tte ut med en skade i leggen like f√∏r pause.üì∑ JAVIER BARBANCHO / Reuters

Det ble Valencia-jubel og Barcelona-nedtur ogs√• i l√∏rdagens f√∏rste kamp, da Dani Parejo og Maxi G√≥mez vendte til 2-1-seier for Valencia borte mot Espanyol.
Hadde det blitt en vinner mellom Sevilla og Atl√©tico Madrid, ville laget g√•tt forbi Barcelona og inntatt tabelltoppen. Kampen endte i stedet 1-1. Sent l√∏rdag kveld hadde ogs√• Real Madrid sjansen til √• klatre til topps, men det ble 0-0 i Betis i et annet oppgj√∏r mellom klubber fra hovedstaden og Sevilla.
L√∏rdagens resultater gj√∏r at Real Sociedad s√∏ndag kan slutte seg til Barcelona og Real Madrid p√• 22 poeng, men da m√• det bli borteseier mot Granada uten Martin √òdegaard, som er ute med skade.
Vinner Granada, er laget ny serieleder.
text:
Shock loss for Barcelona: - Everything fell apart
Barcelona hit and allowed three goals in seven minutes.
02 Nov 2019, 22:42 by NTB-AFP

LEVANTE - BARCELONA 3‚Äì1

Lionel Messi gave the Barcelona manager the lead, but the cheer quickly subsided as home team Levante scored three times in seven minutes en route to a 3-1 victory.
The only consolation was that neither Real Madrid, Atl√©tico Madrid nor Sevilla managed to exploit Barcelona's mistakes and push the team down from the table top.
There was only one point on each of them.

"Everything fell apart," Barcelona coach Erneste Valverde said of the heavy minutes from the 61st to the 68th minute in Valencia.

- We didn't start the second round well. We didn't create chances. Neither did Levante, but then they scored twice in a couple of minutes. The third was tough for us.

Messi scored his sixth goal in five games when he put in a penalty that gave Barcelona the lead on the break. It was his 500th goal scored with the left leg, and it set the course on a new win before everything turned in the second half.

Jos√© Campa√±a and Borja Mayoral scored in the 61st and 63rd minute, thus leading the home team. Nemanja Radoja's 3-1 goal was the last of the match.

LAST: √òdegaard out indefinitely

- Our opponents always play as if it is the most important match of the year. Then one must be able to answer, said Valverde.
Luis Su√°rez suffered a leg injury just before the break. He is doubtful of Tuesday's Champions League match against Slavia Prague.


Luis Su√°rez suffered a leg injury just before the break.üì∑ JAVIER BARBANCHO / Reuters

Valencia's cheer and Barcelona downpour were also in Saturday's first match, when Dani Parejo and Maxi G√≥mez turned in a 2-1 victory for Valencia away from Espanyol.
Had there been a winner between Sevilla and Atl√©tico Madrid, the team would have passed Barcelona and taken the table top. The match ended 1-1. Late Saturday night, Real Madrid also had the chance to climb to the top, but it was 0-0 in Betis in another settlement between clubs from the capital and Seville.
Saturday's results mean that Real Sociedad can join Barcelona and Real Madrid on 22 points on Sunday, but then it must be a victory against Granada without Martin √òdegaard, who is out with injury.
Wins Granada, created new series manager.
